channel.title: Getting Big Problems with Jagex
channel.description:
Hi,
I am new to RuneScape private servers, and was wondering if Jagex could sue me for having a private server. And what must I do to make it legal? I was planning to make a donation system for hosting the server would I get any problems with Jagex? And how can I prefent it?
Big Thanks
-Saratan.

item.title: Getting Big Problems with Jagex
item.dc:creator: @Austin4 Austin.
item.description:
@Austin4 wrote:

Don’t use a webclient and use an offshore host for your VPS and don’t get money by selling items/offering staff positions.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting Big Problems with Jagex
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

The way that jagex shuts down servers is showing that the clients you use have the modules that they made, unless you can remake every single item on a server they will never be legal.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting Big Problems with Jagex
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

As far as i know, if your server gets too big and has to many players sometimes Jagex get them closed down. And i’m pretty sure that you cannot get it to be legal lol.

Im probally wrong lol.

Read full topic
